caption:
This photograph captures a scenic view dominated by maritime and mountainous features. In the foreground, prominently highlighted against a deep blue sea, is a sailboat with a spread sail patterned with horizontal stripes of white, blue, and green. The sailboat appears to be gliding on the water, inhabited by several individuals enjoying the tranquil setting. The midground is peppered with numerous other smaller sailboats dispersed over the water, suggesting a popular sailing area or a possible regatta.

Beyond this lively aquatic scene is a striking backdrop of a large, snow-capped mountain which towers over the landscape. The mountain, covered liberally in snow down to its middle slopes, stands against a clear sky, indicating a serene weather condition. Its prominence and scale lend a majestic quality to the scene, emphasizing a sense of tranquility and grandeur in nature. 

Overall, the composition balances the graceful motion of the sailboats with the steadfast and enduring presence of the mountain, creating a vivid and picturesque tableau.
title: Snow-capped mountains. Hood rises more than 11,000 feet above the Columbia River.
